note.p: Death: Mount Edgcumbe, Sutton, Surrey (15 July 1907)

Career: Went to London (1855); Lecturer in Chemistry, Westminister Hospital Medical School (1863-1897); Chemical Referee, Medical Department of the Privy Council Office; Public Analyst, City of Westminster (1873-1901); involved in enquiries into Thames water and purification of sewage; consulted as an expert in trials and cases involving poisoning
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1907-1908 vol 80 pp xiv-xviii
